item.title: Comparison of Adverserial techniques for synthesizing electronic health records - Data Management and Biomedical DataAnalytics Lab, SBU
item.description: This project was undertaken as a part of our paper “SMOOTH-GAN: Towards Sharpand Smooth Synthetic EHR DataGeneration” to compare the performance of SmoothGAN architecture for generation of Electronic Health Records. We compare the performance of our architecture with other discrete distribution architectures such as MedGAN, WGAN, WGAN-GP, AC-GAN and cGAN.
